original_title: The World Is Round So That Nobody Can Hide In The Corners: Part II — The Kiss
overview: Thousands of homosexual were persecuted, imprisoned and murdered by the Nazi regime.  The Gay Holocast Memorial, in Berlin, intends to honor the victims of persecution and murder, to keep alive the memory of this Injustice.
title: The World Is Round So That Nobody Can Hide In The Corners: Part II — The Kiss
